medical_history.chief_complaint: Gamma-Hydroxybutyrate (GHB) overdose leading to coma and respiratory depression.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was systemically well earlier in the day but became increasingly unresponsive during a family reunion. This deterioration included periods of apnea, bradycardia, hypotension, and bizarre athetoid posturing. Her symptoms progressed over a few hours preceding her admission.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Recent wisdom teeth extractions; strong history of recreational drug abuse.
medical_history.social_history: Reported recreational drug use, particularly GHB.
